inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude le Lorrain delin't. / No. 193. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Published Mar: 1st. 1777 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. title: Apollo and the Muses on Mount Helicon with the Hippocrene Fountain
